label: ABC3_hR5_160_a_a_b-002
title: $\gamma$-Potassium Nitrate (KNO$_{3}$) Structure
comments:
On heating, $\alpha$-KNO$_{3}$ (either \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_oP20_62_c_c_cd-001}{Structure I} or \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_oC80_36_2ab_2ab_2a5b-001}{Structure II}) transforms into \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC6_hR8_166_a_b_h-001}{$\beta$-KNO$_{3}$ at 128$^\circ$C}.  When heated above 200$^\circ$C and then cooled, the $\beta$ phase transforms into the metastable ferroelectric $\gamma$-KNO$_{3}$ phase, which can remain down to room temperature. 
 (Nimmo, 1976) give the data for $\gamma$-KNO$_{3}$ taken at 91$^\circ$C. 
 Although this is isostructural with \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR5_160_a_a_b-001}{the KBrO$_{3}$ ($G0_{7}$) structure}, we have included it here to facilitate the comparison of the various KNO$_{3}$ phases. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR5_160_a_a_b-002}{$\gamma$-KNO$_{3}$} and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC3_hR5_160_a_a_b-001}{KBrO$_{3}$ ($G0_{7}$)} have the same AFLOW prototype label, ABC3\_hR5\_160\_a\_a\_b. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 Hexagonal settings rhombohedral structures can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
